channel.title: Please highlight "events" with a background color in text box
channel.description:
Positive and negative events need a background color in chat. Red for negative to you, green for positive to you.
It's too easy to miss things happening because the event text is all running together.
Here's a visual example, though I just slapped this together quickly:
https://imgur.com/a/OAUm2
